Activity: Wake up, check emails. Get coffee!
Review @cdev-1's feedback regarding character model and animation bugs. Prioritize the most glaring issues. Work on a fix list for the team. Topic: Character Bugs Prioritization
Deep dive into optimizing character assets for performance. Talk with @lpro-1 about profiling tools and techniques. Goal: butter smooth gameplay. Topic: Character Optimization Strategy

Continue storyboarding trailer ideas. Focus on capturing gameplay that showcases the core game mechanics and visual style. Discuss with @lpro-1 on potential music selection. Topic: Trailer Music brainstorming
Optimization of environmental assets for performance. Identify areas that are causing frame rate drops and brainstorm solutions. Simplify geometry, reduce texture sizes, LODs, whatever it takes!
Create a first draft of a few key marketing screenshots. Focus on composition, lighting, and visual storytelling. Need to capture the essence of the game in a single image.
Playtesting! Get some fresh eyes on the game and gather visual feedback. Observe player reactions and note areas that are confusing, distracting, or just plain ugly.
Compile the feedback from playtesting and prioritize visual improvements. Discuss findings with @PEOPLE. Topic: Playtest Visual Feedback
End of the work. Go home.
